title: Ayushman Bhava
overview: Set against the backdrop of Mathura, Ayushman Bhava is a gripping story of Krish. The show depicts the poignant tale of an eight-year-old boy whose childhood is not as simple as others. Like other children his age, Krish plays with toys and games but he also harbors a burning desire to seek justice for the wrong doings in his past life.
